title: "PDFScraping"
output: html_document

```{r}
library(pdftools)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
path = "/Users/peteway/Downloads/TDH-2019-Novel-Coronavirus-Epi-and-Surveillance.pdf"
raw = pdf_data(path)
raw = as.data.frame(raw)

rawtext = pdf_text(path) %>% read_lines()
```

```{r}
library(reshape2)
library(tidyr)
# test = dcast(raw, x~y, value.var="text")
unstack(raw, text ~ y)
```


```{r}
test = aggregate(data=raw,text~y,FUN=paste)
```



```{r}
# rawtext = pdf_text(path)
spacing = "        "
testtext = str_replace_all(rawtext, spacing, "")
testtext = as.data.frame(testtext)
```


```{r}
library(tabulizer)
pdf_tables <- tabulizer::extract_tables(path,output = "data.frame")
```
